modName: Cooking Expanded - Dragonborn - Realistic Needs and Disease Support Patch
summary: This is a small patch that adds the hunger and thirst effects to the food added by the Cooking Expanded Dragonborn patch.
descriptionHtml:
This patch adds RND hunger and thirst support for the following foods which were added by "Cooking Expanded - Dragonborn".

In the load order it should be after Cooking Expanded - Dragonborn and Realistic Needs and Disease.

Ash Hopper Leg
Ash Hopper Meat
Ash Hopper Stew
Pickled Ash hopper Leg
Boar Meat
Cooked Boar Meat
Boar and Apple Stew
Yam Pie
Yam Soup
Ash Yam
Baked Ash Yam
Horker Ash Yam Stew
author: Glorifin
